original_text: You must be brave! When you hear news in Babylon of what is happening, do not be afraid. People will report one thing this year, and next year they will report a different thing. They will speak about violence in the land, and about rulers who are fighting against each other. You must be brave! When you hear news in Babylon of what is happening, do not be afraid. People will report one thing this year, and next year they will report a different thing. They will speak about violence in the land, and about rulers who are fighting against each other. You must be brave! When you hear news in Babylon of what is happening, do not be afraid. People will report one thing this year, and next year they will report a different thing. They will speak about violence in the land, and about rulers who are fighting against each other. You must be brave! When you hear news in Babylon of what is happening, do not be afraid. People will report one thing this year, and next year they will report a different thing. They will speak about violence in the land, and about rulers who are fighting against each other. You must be brave! When you hear news in Babylon of what is happening, do not be afraid. People will report one thing this year, and next year they will report a different thing. They will speak about violence in the land, and about rulers who are fighting against each other. You must be brave!
korean_text: 너희 마음을 나약하게 말며 이 땅에서 들리는 소문으로 말미암아 두려워하지 말라 소문은 이 해에도 있겠고 저 해에도 있으리라 그 땅에는 강포함이 있어 다스리는 자가 다스리는 자를 서로 치리라

sentences.original_text: When you hear news in Babylon

sentences.korean_translation: 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는지에 대한 소식을 들을 때

sentences.original_text: People will report one thing this year,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 올해 한 가지를 보고할 것이고

sentences.original_text: they will report a different thing.
They will speak about violence in the land,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 땅에서 폭력에 대해 말할 것이고

sentences.original_text: who are fighting against each other.
sentences.korean_translation: 서로 싸우고 있는 통치자들에 대해 말할 것입니다.
